[[inst_hl_shi_upr]]
==== HL.SHI.UPR

*Syntax:* hl.shi.upr SrcD, [SrcR, simm], ->{t, u, Rd}

*Description:* Long immediate variant supporting extended address range (48-bit).

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_shi_upr.svg[HL.SHI.UPR encoding,width=800]

*Group:* STA/PRE_INDEX
